text:
[Verse]
Stars above they shine so bright
Wishing on a moonlit night
Chasing dreams out of sight
In the glow of lunar light

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on a dusty road
Heartbeats in a secret code
Fantasy our heavy load
In this voyage we've been towed

[Chorus]
Dreams in the moonlight
Dance into the starlight
Holding on so tight
Till the morning's first light

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the night sky clear
Every moment feels so near
Lost in wonder without fear
As the magic time draws near

[Bridge]
Broken hearts will mend tonight
In the silken silver light
Feel the universe unite
Everything feels so right

[Chorus]
Dreams in the moonlight
Dance into the starlight
Holding on so tight
Till the morning's first light
title: Dreams in the Moonlight
